title: Talking Gina the Giraffe v1.2.4
description:
PLEASE NOTE: When running the app for the first time you will be required to download additional 7-29 MB to get the best graphics quality for your specific device.

From the creators of Talking Tom comes Talking Gina, your talking pet giraffe!
NEW: Play Patty Cake with Talking Gina the Giraffe (patent pending). This original and addictive reflex-building hand clapping game is fun and challenging for all ages!

ABOUT GINA: Say anything to Gina and she will speak your words back to you the way only she knows how. Take good care of her and she will be the best friend you ever had! Make sure not to neglect her or treat her badly or she wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be as cheery.

Not to worry though, you can be sure to keep her happy by playing 48 levels of Patty Cake, an addictive hand clapping game that will improve your reflexes, your hand-eye coordination and your friendship with Gina! 

SheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll thank you for it!
Record videos of Talking Gina and share them with friends via YouTube, Facebook, email or MMS.

PAID FEATURES

- Unlimited strawberries, lemonades and ice cream cones

HOW TO KEEP GINA HAPPY

- Play a hand clapping game with her (48 levels, three speeds per level, and original music).
- Feed her any of her favorite snacks including carrots, strawberries or ice cream.
- Give her water or lemonade so she doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t get too thirsty.
- Don't poke her too often. Be nice!
- Don't neglect her. Play with her every day and get a daily BONUS!

ACHIEVEMENTS

- When GinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s happiness is at 70%, give Gina a helium balloon and sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll repeat your words in a funny voice.
- When GinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s happiness is at 90%, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll gives you kisses to let you know how much she loves you!
- When GinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s happiness is at 100%, you get a new baby giraffe!
- Keep Gina active by completing all 48 levels of Patty Cake with her, and collect medals for each completed speed!

What's New:

1.2.4: App is now translated into German, French, Italian, Spanish and Portuguese.
